      Classes in nl.vpro.logging.simple that implement SimpleLogger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStringBuilderSimpleLogger
      Simply logs everything to a StringBuilder.
      class  ChainedSimpleLogger
      Wraps all log events to zero or more other instances of SimpleLogger
      class  ConsoleLogger
      Simply logs everything to stdout/stderr
      class  FileSimpleLogger
      Simply logs everything to a File.
      class  FloggerSimpleLogger 
      class  JULSimpleLogger
      SimpleLogger that wraps a java.util.logger.
      class  Log4jSimpleLogger
      SimpleLogger that wraps Logger
      class  NOPLogger 
      class  OutputStreamSimpleLogger 
      class  QueueSimpleLogger<E extends QueueSimpleLogger.Event>
      A SimpleLogger that adds every log event to a Queue of QueueSimpleLogger.Event's (or possibly extensions thereof) It is abstract because you need to implement how to instantiate a new QueueSimpleLogger.Event extension for the queue via QueueSimpleLogger.createEvent(Level, CharSequence, Throwable) If you have no need for that, you can instantiate via QueueSimpleLogger.of(Queue).
      class  SimpleLoggerWrapper
      It is hard to wrap every call to e.g.
      class  Slf4jSimpleLogger
      Wraps an SLF4J Logger
      class  StringBuilderSimpleLogger
      Simply logs everything to a StringBuilder.
